message:
Summary: **USER_CONTEXT:** Read PR #103 and address all code review comments from Gemini Code Assist

**TASK_TRACKING:**
- Task 1: Remove unused @patch decorator and mock_fetch_and_update from test_update_feed_url_success - **DONE**
- Task 2: Fix handleEditFeedSubmit function structure and simplify error handling - **IN_PROGRESS**
- Task 3: Verify all code review comments addressed - **TODO**
- Task 4: Test changes and commit fixes - **TODO**

**COMPLETED:** 
- Removed unused @patch('backend.app.fetch_and_update_feed') decorator and mock_fetch_and_update parameter from test_update_feed_url_success in backend/test_app.py
- Verified no other references to mock_fetch_and_update in test file

**PENDING:**
- Fix malformed handleEditFeedSubmit function structure in frontend/script.js
- Complete simplification of error handling as per code review
- Test all changes
- Commit fixes to address PR #103 review comments

**CURRENT_STATE:** Working on fixing broken JavaScript function structure with mismatched braces and syntax errors

**CODE_STATE:**
- File: backend/test_app.py - test function simplified
- File: frontend/script.js - handleEditFeedSubmit function has structural issues

**CHANGES:**
- Modified backend/test_app.py: Removed unused mock setup from test_update_feed_url_success
- Modified frontend/script.js: Multiple attempts to fix function structure (currently broken)

**VERSION_CONTROL_STATUS:** 
- Branch: feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed
- Modified files: backend/test_app.py, frontend/script.js
- Uncommitted changes present
